properties.name: parent
properties.description: The object's container.

properties.name: typename
properties.description: The class name of the object.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The application's name.

properties.name: path
properties.description: Path specification for the application.

properties.name: activeDocument
properties.description: The active document.

properties.name: userAdobeID
properties.description: The current users adobe id.

properties.name: userGUID
properties.description: The current user's GUID.

properties.name: version
properties.description: The version of the Adobe Illustrator application.

properties.name: buildNumber
properties.description: The build number of the Adobe Illustrator application.

properties.name: locale
properties.description: The Locale of the Adobe Illustrator application.

properties.name: scriptingVersion
properties.description: The version of the Scripting plugin.

properties.name: freeMemory
properties.description: The amount of unused memory within the Adobe Illustrator partition.

properties.name: browserAvailable
properties.description: Is a web browser available?

properties.name: selection
properties.description: The selection visible to the user.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Is the application visible.

properties.name: userInteractionLevel
properties.description: What level of interaction with the user should be allowed when handling script commands.

properties.name: coordinateSystem
properties.description: Coordinate System used by script.

properties.name: preferences
properties.description: Preferences for Illustrator.

properties.name: printerList
properties.description: The list of installed printers.

properties.name: PPDFileList
properties.description: The list of PPD files currently available for use. For performance reasons, the PPDFile entry only contains the model name and file spec of each PPD file.

properties.name: printPresetsList
properties.description: The list of print preset names currently available for use.

properties.name: startupPresetsList
properties.description: The list of presets available for creating a new document.

properties.name: PDFPresetsList
properties.description: The list of PDF preset names currently available for use.

properties.name: flattenerPresetsList
properties.description: The list of flattener style names currently available for use.

properties.name: tracingPresetsList
properties.description: The list of tracing preset names currently available for use.

properties.name: colorSettingsList
properties.description: The list of color settings files currently available for use.

properties.name: defaultColorSettings
properties.description: The default color settings file for the current application locale.

properties.name: pasteRemembersLayers
properties.description: Does paste operation remember layers structure?

properties.name: documents
properties.description: The open documents.

properties.name: textFonts
properties.description: Installed fonts.

methods.name: runAPITest
methods.description: Runs API Tests from the TestAPI Plug-in.

parameters.name: testName
parameters.description: Arguments for Running Tests - eg. Name of Test/Suite.

methods.name: aATLoadModel
methods.description: Loads the aat model to the editor.

methods.name: aATLoadUIExtension
methods.description: Loads a UI description as an extension to the editor.

methods.name: aATLoadLibExtension
methods.description: Loads a session file as an extension to the editor.

methods.name: aATExecuteSession
methods.description: Executes the active session in the sequencer.

methods.name: aATExecuteSessionFromFile
methods.description: Executes the active session in the sequencer.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Execute a session file.

methods.name: aATGetEditorDialogFile
methods.description: Retrieves a file path to the AAT editor swf.

methods.name: getVersionString
methods.description: Retrieves a string representing the AAT version.

methods.name: aATGetErrorDialogFile
methods.description: Retrieves a file path to the AAT error dialog swf.

methods.name: aATErrorsExist
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean indicating the presence of errors in the last script to execute.

methods.name: getExecutionOutput
methods.description: Retrieves a string containing the results of the last script to execute.

methods.name: aATClear
methods.description: Clear the sequencer.

methods.name: aATGetSession
methods.description: Get the active session for the sequncer.

methods.name: aATSaveSession
methods.description: Saves the active session in the sequencer to a file.

methods.name: aATSaveAsSession
methods.description: Saves the active session in the sequencer to a new file.

methods.name: aATLoadSessionFile
methods.description: Loads a session into the sequencer.

methods.name: aATAddItem
methods.description: Add the specified to the sequencer.

parameters.name: sessionIndex
parameters.description: The index in the session of the top-most sequence for the item to add.

parameters.name: destinationSequenceID
parameters.description: The UID for the owning sequence.

parameters.name: destinationIndex
parameters.description: The item UID where to insert.

parameters.name: srcItemIDData
parameters.description: The item ID of the item to construct.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The source of the item to construct.

methods.name: aATMoveItem
methods.description: Moves the specified in the sequencer.

parameters.name: sessionIndex
parameters.description: The index in the session of the top-most sequence for the item to move.

parameters.name: moveThisID
parameters.description: The UID of the item to replace.

parameters.name: newSessionIndex
parameters.description: The index in the session of the destination top-most sequence.

parameters.name: destinationSequenceID
parameters.description: The UID for the owning sequence.

parameters.name: destinationIndex
parameters.description: The index where to insert.

methods.name: aATReplaceItem
methods.description: Replaces the specified to the sequencer.

parameters.name: sessionIndex
parameters.description: The index in the session of the top-most sequence for the item to add.

parameters.name: replaceThisID
parameters.description: The UID of the item to replace.

parameters.name: srcItemIDData
parameters.description: The item ID of the item to construct.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The source of the item to construct.

methods.name: aATRemoveItem
methods.description: Removes the specified item from the sequencer.

parameters.name: sessionIndex
parameters.description: The index in the session of the top-most sequence for the item to add.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item UID.

methods.name: aATDuplicateItem
methods.description: Duplicates the specified item(s) from the sequencer.

parameters.name: sessionIndex
parameters.description: The index in the session of the top-most sequence for the item to add.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item UID(s)

methods.name: aATEditItem
methods.description: Opens the specified item from the sequencer in the item editor.

parameters.name: sessionIndex
parameters.description: The index in the session of the top-most sequence for the item to add.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item UID.

methods.name: applyDataToItem
methods.description: Applies the data used in the item editor to the item.

parameters.name: sessionIndex
parameters.description: The index in the session of the top-most sequence for the item to edit.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item UID.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to apply in XML format.

methods.name: applySingleDataPointToItem
methods.description: Applies data to the specified item from the sequencer in the item editor.

parameters.name: sessionIndex
parameters.description: The index in the session of the top-most sequence for the item to add.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item UID.

parameters.name: dataID
parameters.description: The data to apply in XML format.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to apply in XML format.

methods.name: translateString
methods.description: Returns a string translated from the key and source data passed in.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The string to translate.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The plugin name from the source of the key.

methods.name: aATFileSaveDialog
methods.description: Prompts the user to save a file or choose a file or directory and returns a relative path string to the file.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The path relative to the folder specified by Relative.

parameters.name: relative
parameters.description: The current relative path token.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of dialog to show in string format.

methods.name: aATFileRelativeChanged
methods.description: Switches a files relative token and path.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The path relative to the folder specified by Relative.

parameters.name: relative
parameters.description: The current relative path token.

parameters.name: newRelative
parameters.description: The new relative path token.

methods.name: aATGetListOfRelativePaths
methods.description: Gets an XML string listing the relative paths and the UI strings to display them.

methods.name: cut
methods.description: Cut current selection to the clipboard.

methods.name: copy
methods.description: Copy current selection to the clipboard.

methods.name: paste
methods.description: Paste clipboard into the current document.

methods.name: undo
methods.description: Undo the last transaction.

methods.name: redo
methods.description: Redo the last transaction.

methods.name: doScript
methods.description: Play an action from the Actions Palette.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The name of the action to play (note that the case of letters in the Action name is important and must match the case of the name in the Actions palette)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The name of the action set containing the action being played (note that the case of letters in the Action Set name is important and must match the case of the name in the Actions palette)
Are dialog boxes associated with the action to be presented?
parameters.name: dialogs

methods.name: executeMenuCommand
methods.description: Executes a menu command using the menu shortcut string.

parameters.name: menuCommandString
parameters.description: Menu command shortcut.

methods.name: getPresetFileOfType
methods.description: Given a preset type, returns the full path to the application's default document profile for the type.

parameters.name: presetType
parameters.description: The preset type.

methods.name: loadAction
methods.description: Load an action into action palette.

parameters.name: actionFilePath
parameters.description: The path on the system of the action file to be loaded.

methods.name: unloadAction
methods.description: Unloads an action into action palette.

parameters.name: setName
parameters.description: Name of the set to be unloaded.

parameters.name: actionName
parameters.description: Name of the action to be unloaded.

methods.name: sendScriptMessage
methods.description: Sends the script message to the required plugin.

parameters.name: pluginName
parameters.description: Plugin to which message needs to be sent.

parameters.name: messageSelector
parameters.description: Functionality that is to be executed.

parameters.name: inputString
parameters.description: Pass any data encoded in a string.

methods.name: getPresetSettings
methods.description: Given a preset name, tries and retrieves the settings from the preset template.

parameters.name: preset
parameters.description: The name of the preset.

methods.name: redraw
methods.description: Force Illustrator to redraw its window(s)

methods.name: invertMatrix
methods.description: Invert a matrix.

parameters.name: matrix
parameters.description: The matrix to invert.

methods.name: isSingularMatrix
methods.description: Tests if a matrix is singular (cannot be inverted)

parameters.name: matrix
parameters.description: The matrix to check.

methods.name: concatenateTranslationMatrix
methods.description: Concatenate a translation to a transformation matrix.

parameters.name: matrix
parameters.description: The matrix that is to be added to.
Horizontal transformation.
parameters.name: deltaX

parameters.description: Vertical transformation.
parameters.name: deltaY

methods.name: concatenateScaleMatrix
methods.description: Concatenate a scale matrix to a transformation matrix.

parameters.name: matrix
parameters.description: The matrix that is to be added to.
Horizontal scaling factor expressed as a percentage (100 = 100%)
parameters.name: scaleX

parameters.description: Vertical scaling factor expressed as a percentage (100 = 100%)
parameters.name: scaleY

methods.name: concatenateRotationMatrix
methods.description: Concatenate a rotation matrix to a transformation matrix.

parameters.name: matrix
parameters.description: The matrix that is to be added to.

parameters.name: angle
parameters.description: Angle of rotation (in degrees)

methods.name: concatenateMatrix
methods.description: Concatenate two transformation matrices.

parameters.name: matrix
parameters.description: The matrix that is to be added to.

parameters.name: secondMatrix
parameters.description: Second transformation matrix.

methods.name: isEqualMatrix
methods.description: Compares two matrices for equality.

parameters.name: matrix
parameters.description: First transformation matrix to compare.

parameters.name: secondMatrix
parameters.description: Second transformation matrix.

methods.name: getIdentityMatrix
methods.description: Returns an identity matrix.

methods.name: getRotationMatrix
methods.description: Returns a rotation transformation matrix.

parameters.description: Angle of rotation (in degrees)
parameters.name: angle

methods.name: getScaleMatrix
methods.description: Returns a scale transformation matrix.

parameters.description: Horizontal scaling factor expressed as a percentage (100 = 100%)
parameters.name: scaleX

parameters.description: Vertical scaling factor expressed as a percentage (100 = 100%)
parameters.name: scaleY

methods.name: getTranslationMatrix
methods.description: Returns a translation matrix.

parameters.description: Horizontal transformation.
parameters.name: deltaX

parameters.description: Vertical transformation.
parameters.name: deltaY

methods.name: open
methods.description: Open the specified document file.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The file to be opened.

parameters.name: documentColorSpace
parameters.description: Choose color space only for documents saved with multiple color models (pre-Illustrator 9)

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options for opening a particular type of file.

methods.name: dumpPGFFile
methods.description: Dump the PGF portion of ai file to txt file.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The AI file to be opened.

parameters.name: documentColorSpace
parameters.description: Choose color space only for documents saved with multiple color models (pre-Illustrator 9)

parameters.name: pGFFile
parameters.description: Folder to save the output PGF file.

methods.name: quit
methods.description: Quit the application.

methods.name: translatePlaceholderText
methods.description: Translate the placeholder text to regular text. A method to enter unicode points in hex values.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The placeholder text to be translated.

methods.name: showPresets
methods.description: Get presets from the file.

parameters.name: fileSpec
parameters.description: File spec to import from.

methods.name: loadColorSettings
methods.description: Load the color settings from the file. If the file is an empty file spec, the color management will be turned off.

parameters.name: fileSpec
parameters.description: File spec for the color settings.

methods.name: getPPDFileInfo
methods.description: Get detailed info from the specified PPD file.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The model name of the PPD file.

methods.name: getScriptableHelpGroup
methods.description: Get the scriptable help group object that represents the search widget in the app bar.

methods.name: convertSampleColor
methods.description: Converts a sample-component color from one color space to another.

parameters.name: sourceColorSpace
parameters.description: The source color space.

parameters.name: sourceColor
parameters.description: The color to convert, an array of color components. First location of the array should contain alpha if source-has-alpha is true.

parameters.name: destColorSpace
parameters.description: The destination color space.

parameters.name: colorConvertPurpose
parameters.description: The parameter which passes the purpose of conversion.
True if alpha channel is present in source color.
parameters.name: sourceHasAlpha

parameters.description: True if alpha channel is present in destination color.
parameters.name: destHasAlpha

methods.name: reflectCSAW
methods.description: Generate Creative Suite ActionScript Wrappers in specified directory.

parameters.name: outputFolder
parameters.description: Location for the output files.

methods.name: switchWorkspace
methods.description: Switches between workspaces.

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Workspace Name.

methods.name: deleteWorkspace
methods.description: Deletes an existing workspace.

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Workspace Name.

methods.name: saveWorkspace
methods.description: Saves a new workspace.

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Workspace Name.

methods.name: resetWorkspace
methods.description: Resets the current workspace.
